name: Amazing Maze (Bazzix)
description:
Hello everyone!

My name is Branimir Belić, I'm solo developer and this is my first game ever.

It is called Amazing Maze.

You are controlling a tank through different levels and your goal is to explore
and collect as much nuts as possible.
Levels are getting harder and harder as you finish them.
There is a total of 50 levels.

Good luck and have fun! :)

Controls: -W,A,S,D (or arrow keys) to move
-left mouse button to fire
-mouse scroll for zoom-in/zoom-out

p.s.
If you like the game, feel free to donate. It would help me a lot. Thanks!

Contact: br.belic@gmail.com
